title: Client keeps crashing during champ select
body:
Every 4-5 games client will crash hopefully after I pick then I just wait until loading screen and close and reopen client and its good but otherwise it counts it as a dodge. I dodge a ton even tho I never intend to. 

LOL while I was typing this it crashed in the store right when I clicked on play.
http://s33.postimg.org/7ef8y0ez3/crash.png
http://s33.postimg.org/d8z8rzsgf/crash1.png

replies.body:
Hmmm...given that this happens consistently and in different parts of the client through an OS error message, it is possible that there is some sort of corruption with the installation itself causing it to crash.  To rule this out as a possible root cause, make sure to complete a [full and clean re-installation](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040).

If the issue still persists, let me know!

The problem persists after a full reinstall. I have narrowed it down to 99% of the time it happens right as i lock in my champion.
